button_nuke_drop.message:
Click here to refresh Videostream
if it acts differently than normal!

button_quality_stuttering.message: If your video is stuttering very often try changing the quality setting below!

cart_description_lifetime.message: You will be charged $1 today and you'll receive Videostream Premium forever!

cart_description_lifetime_new.message: You will be charged $1 today and you'll receive Videostream Premium forever!

cart_description_monthly.message: You will be charged $1 monthly starting today! You can cancel at anytime!

cart_description_monthly_new.message: You will be charged $1 monthly starting today! You can cancel at anytime!

cart_description_yearly.message: You will be charged $1 today and you will receive Videostream Premium for a year! You will then be charged a discounted monthly rate for every month after that.

cart_description_yearly_new.message: You will be charged $1 today and you will receive Videostream Premium for a year! You will then be charged a discounted monthly rate for every month after that.

Smart people said we have to tell you to read our terms of service, so read them or you can't buy this thing.
(We told them you wouldn't anyway)

cast_extension_dialog_p1.message: Videostream needs the cast extension to talk to your TV!

cast_extension_dialog_p2.message: Good news, you just get it here: .

cast_extension_title.message: Do you have the cast extension installed?

cast_extension_unsupported_dialog_p1.message: Videostream needs the Google Cast extension to talk to your Chromecast!

cast_extension_unsupported_dialog_p2.message: Good news, you just get it here:

cast_no_receivers_dialog_p1.message: If you do have a chromecast on your network, copy this: chrome://restart

cast_no_receivers_dialog_p2.message: And paste that into your address bar! Then hit enter :)

cast_no_receivers_dialog_p3.message: (if that doesn't help, reboot your router!)

cast_timeout_dialog_p1.message: Try typing chrome://restart into your address bar

cast_timeout_dialog_p2.message: After Chrome restarts you should be good to go. If you get this message again please contact us!

cast_timeout_title.message: We're having trouble talking to your Chromecast!

chat_fake_respond.message: Type here to chat with Matt :)

chat_fake_text.message: Matt: Let me know what's up with Videostream if you have anything go wrong! I'm here to help :)

chat_hidden_message.message: Chat hidden for 2 weeks - you can still access the chat from the HELP menu :)

chat_request_body.message:
from Videostream wants to live chat with you!
(No this isn't a robot)

chat_request_body_2.message:
If you have any problems or issues with the app (or just want to tell us how great it is) this is your chance to let us know!

One of the creators of Videostream is standing by to take your feedback be it good or bad! Press accept below to get connected :)

choose_device_subtitle.message: Select the device you are streaming to:

chromium_nacl_missing_plugin_dialog_p1.message:
Your Chromium build doesn't run Google's NaCl!
  • Try Google Chrome
  • If your Linux distro isn't supported by Chrome, find a chromium build with NaCl built in.
  • If you think you have NaCl, make sure "Native Client" is enabled in chrome://plugins. Reboot afterwards!

continue_watching_dialog_p1.message: Continue Watching will allow you to resume videos you partially watched - soon the section will also show you next episodes in any series you are watching!

continue_watching_dialog_p2.message: The history is not saved past 5 videos, and you can delete them individually or stop history from being recorded by turning off this feature HERE

dialog_get_extension_p1.message: Get our shortcut extension to add a button right into chrome! You can also add it from our help menu (top right) later if you'd like!

drag_and_drop_error_content.message:
Videostream doesn't support drag-and-drop (sorry!).
Use the "Choose a Video" button to begin streaming to your Chromecast!

dropzone_main_heading.message: Drop your files here to play them!

dropzone_main_subheading.message: Folders will be added to your playlist

dropzone_playlist_heading.message: Drop files and folders to add them to your playlist!

dvd_file_dialog_p1.message: Try loading the VOB file instead of the IFO or BUP file.

dvd_file_dialog_p2.message: If you know this is the correct file, we can .

dvd_file_dialog_p3.message: Let us know if we were wrong and you were right!! It happens...

dvd_file_title.message: We think you're attempting to play the wrong file!

email_request_text_1.message:
Want early access to the latest and greatest from Videostream?

Enter your email below to get an invite to the Videostream beta testers program:

email_request_text_2.message:
Videostream is made by 6 guys in Canada and sometimes we like to ask questions about how we’re doing.

Enter your email if you’d be cool with that, we’ll never mass email!

email_request_text_3.message: Want to help make Videostream better? Enter your email below and we'll contact you about upcoming features and idea to get your input!

external_sub_too_large.message: The subtitle you loaded is too big! We can only load subtitles smaller than 1MB.

firewall_failure_dialog_p1.message:
Firewalls sometimes stop us from talking to your Chromecast, or your wifi network may be set to public!
Don’t worry though, we can help you to let us through. We promise to make it super easy!

firewall_failure_dialog_p2.message: Windows? Try this Utility. Download it, run it. It will open, and then almost immediately close when it's finished!

firewall_failure_title.message: Uh Oh! It looks like your firewall is blocking Videostream :(

global_failure_dialog_p1.message: We totally messed something up, can you help us fix it?? Just hit the contact button below and we’ll send ourselves information about the problem. Let us know what happened!

google_login_page_help_text.message:
If this message persists, you may need to log in to Google Chrome again. You can find instructions on how to do that .
If that doesn't work, you can email us at:

google_login_page_loading_text.message: Attempting to connect to your Google Account

google_wallet_page_help_text.message:
If this message persists, you may need to log in to Google Chrome again. You can find instructions on how to do that .
If that doesn't work, you can email us at:

help_dialog_chromeos_p1.message: We’re really sorry but right now Google has a bug that makes it almost impossible for Videostream to work on Chromebooks or other ChromeOS devices :’(

help_dialog_chromeos_p2.message: We have an experimental guide on getting us to work you can check out, otherwise we can let you know when Google fixes their problem.

help_dialog_drop_p1.message: If you were trying to play a video and it unexpectedly stopped, follow these steps to fix it (if everything seems to be working normally then you can ignore this message):

help_dialog_drop_p2.message:
1) Reboot your Chormecast
2) Reboot your router
3) Reboot your computer
(This fixes the bug 100% of the time in our experience)

help_dialog_drop_p3.message: * We're really sorry about this bug! It's actually caused by the Chromecast itself and isn't something we can fix ourselves! You can help google fix the bug here

help_dialog_drop_title.message: You may have just encountered an bug!

invalid_file_dialog_p1.message: The file you’ve tried to load doesn’t look like something we can play! If you want, we can .

invalid_file_dialog_p2.message: Let us know if we were wrong and you were right!! It happens...

invalid_file_title.message: Oops!! We don’t think that’s a video or a song!

linux_firewall_failure_dialog_p1.message:
Oh hello Linux user! Try running these commands to open the ports (TCP 5556 and 5558) we need:

sudo /sbin/iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --dport 5556 -j ACCEPT
sudo /sbin/iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --dport 5558 -j ACCEPT

Then hit "try again" - If that doesn’t help, shoot us an email, just attach the logs we generate :)

linux_firewall_failure_dialog_tryagain.message: Click here to try again after running those commands

loader_card_antivirus_dialog_p1.message: Do you have anything installed like McAfee, Norton, Avast, AVG, Malwarebytes, Bitdefender, Windows Security Essentials, ESET, Kaspersky, etc.?

loader_card_antivirus_dialog_p2.message: You may need to add an exception for "chrome.exe" in your antivirus client then restart your computer!

loader_card_antivirus_dialog_p3.message: Email us if you need any help! We're team@getvideostream.com :)

loader_card_antivirus_header.message: It looks like your antivirus is blocking Videostream :(

loader_card_chromecast_timeout_header.message: Oh fiddlesticks! We need a reload!

loader_card_chromecast_timeout_p1.message: Sorry! We hit an error. Click below to reload Videostream!

loader_card_chromecast_timeout_p2.message: If this keeps happening, let me know by emailing matt@getvideostream.com - tell me what's up!

loader_card_dvd_header.message: Are you trying to play a DVD?

loader_card_dvd_p1.message: Try picking the VOB file instead of the IFO or BUP file.

loader_card_dvd_p2.message: If you know this is the correct file, you can try anyway (click below).

loader_card_dvd_p3.message: Note that not all DVD files can play in Videostream!

loader_card_firewall_header.message: It looks like your firewall is blocking Videostream :(

loader_card_incompatible_file_header.message: Oops!! We don’t think that’s a video or a song!

loader_card_incompatible_file_p1.message: The file you’ve tried to load doesn’t look like something we can play! If you want, we can try to play it anyway.

loader_card_linux_firewall_failure_dialo.message:
Oh hello Linux user! Try running these commands to open the ports (TCP 5556 and 5558) we need:

sudo /sbin/iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --dport 5556 -j ACCEPT
sudo /sbin/iptables -A INPUT -p tcp --dport 5558 -j ACCEPT

Then hit "try again" - If that doesn’t help, shoot us an email at team@getvideostream.com :)

loader_card_mac_firewall_failure_dialog_.message: How to allow Chrome ("allow specific connections")

Your firewall is probably blocking Videostream! Try allowing Chrome through your Mac firewall - After that click "try again" below :)

If you've fixed this before, hit the reload button (and double check your firewall settings)! Email us at team@getvideostream.com for help!

loader_card_no_chromecast_header.message: We can't find any chromecasts on your network!

loader_card_no_chromecast_p1.message: Make sure you're connected to the same network as your Chromecast :)

loader_card_no_chromecast_p2.message: If you do have a chromecast try restarting your router, your chromecast, and then Google Chrome!

loader_card_no_network_header.message: We can't find an Internet connection!

loader_card_no_network_p1.message: Make sure that you're connected to wifi or wired internet! Did your cat pull out a cable?

loader_card_no_network_p2.message: This popup will close when we connect!

loader_card_windows_10_firewall_failure_.message: Did you recently upgrade to Windows 10? Don't panic! Simply download and run the utility below and it'll patch up your firewall so Videostream can run again! :)

Firewalls sometimes stop us from talking to your Chromecast, or your wifi network may be set to public!
Don’t worry though, we can help you to let us through. We promise to make it super easy!
Try this utility. Download it and run it (for techies it opens TCP 5556 and 5558). After it runs or if you think you're seeing this popup by mistake, hit the reload and try again button below!

loader_card_windows_firewall_failure_dia.message:
Firewalls sometimes stop us from talking to your Chromecast, or your wifi network may be set to public!
Don’t worry though, we can help you to let us through. We promise to make it super easy!
Try this utility. Download it and run it (for techies it opens TCP 5556 and 5558). After it runs or if you think you're seeing this popup by mistake, hit the reload and try again button below!

loader_overlay_reload.message: Video not loading? Click here to reload Videostream

login_dialog_p1.message:
By logging in, we'll be able to send you information on new releases, trending videos, and new seasons of shows! Over time we'll try to personalize this for you. We promise not to email you every day like stupid companies do. We hate that.

Just hit 'Log In' below and accept the permission!

mac_firewall_failure_dialog_howto.message: How to allow Chrome ("allow specific connections")

mac_firewall_failure_dialog_p1.message:
Your firewall is probably blocking Videostream! Try allowing Chrome through your Mac firewall - After that click "try again" below :)

If that doesn’t help, email us and we’ll give you a hand!

nacl_antivirus_failure_dialog_p1.message: Antivirus software stops us from converting your videos into a format your Chromecast can read, only some of your videos will play!

nacl_antivirus_failure_dialog_p2.message: The video you’ve picked won’t work, but we have some easy steps you can follow to let your antivirus know we’re safe!

nacl_antivirus_failure_title.message: Sorry! We’re having trouble with your antivirus

nacl_missing_plugin_dialog_p1.message: If you're running Chromium, try Google Chrome! Most Chromium installs don't include Native Client support!

nacl_missing_plugin_dialog_p2.message: If you don't what what we're talking about, contact us :)

new_nacl_missing_plugin_dialog_p1.message:
1)Type "chrome://plugins" into your address bar

2)Find "Native Client" and click enable

3)Type "chrome://restart" into your address bar

no_continue_watching.message: Your recently watched videos will show up here, up to 5 are kept in history - You can remove individual items.

no_recent_downloads.message: Your recent downloads will show up here - You can remove individual items.

pair_complete_dialog_about.message:
Great! You're all done. We're quickly finding your videos, they will appear on
your phone as we find them - this can take a few minutes

pair_complete_dialog_about_2.message:
You can add and remove folders from your media library
from the Videostream settings menu!

pair_complete_dialog_title.message: Pairing and Media Library Set Up Complete!

pair_dialog_about.message:
Select folders where you store your videos. You'll be able to search these
from the Videostream mobile app :)

pair_dialog_first_about.message: To browse your videos using your phone you need to pair them together! On the next page, you will let us know where you keep your media so we can see it.

pair_dialog_title.message: Pair a Phone - Set up Media Library

pitch_page_beta_app_description.message: We make other apps too! We'll entertain you in new ways on your Chromecast!

pitch_page_no_ads_description.message: Ad-phobic? No worries! Premium means you'll never see an ad!

pitch_page_notification_app_description.message: Get notifications to your Android phone when a download is done!

pitch_page_playlist_support_description.message: Create a playlist that saves when you close Videostream - mp3 supported!

pitch_page_smartphone_support_descriptio.message: Control Videostream and browse your videos right from your Android phone!

pitch_page_support_us_description.message: Your subscription lets us eat two square meals a day! We love you!

post_portfix_firewall_failure_title.message: Do you have your own antivirus or firewall?

premflow_https_text.message: Page secured with HTTPS/SSL. Any Credit Card data is sent encrypted using HTTPS to Stripe. Any Google Authentication is anonymized prior to any communication with our server for Premium user identification.

premflow_lifetime_promo_subtag.message: SALE!!! A deal so good it's sold at Costco!

premflow_lifetime_promo_subtag_yearly.message: SALE!!! You don’t need a Groupon for this deal!

premflow_monthly_subtag.message: Playlists, our love, and more for the cost of a coffee!

premflow_pitch_h3.message: Just select your plan, pay, and you've got Premium! Yeah, we don't make you create an account ;)

premium_choose_a_plan.message: Choose a plan and be awesome:

premium_pitch_description.message:
Videostream Premium is what helps our team afford to eat. :)
For a buck forty-nine a month you get:

premium_playlist_notify_dialog_p1.message: Did you know about Videostream Premium? It will give you full access to control playlists and build your own. Plus it lets us work full time on Videostream and keep it ad-free!

premium_playlist_notify_dialog_p2.message: It costs about the same as a movie ticket each year and comes with awesome features we're always adding to:

premium_playlist_notify_title.message: Get your own Playlist with Videostream Premium!

quality_change_question_dialog_content.message:
Hey there! Videostream is currently testing "Adaptive" quality. This means we're going to automatically select the best quality to allow your video to play without buffering, sounds cool, eh?

Anyway, it looks like you just turned it off, why's that? Did you hit a snag? Send me (Graham) an email and let me know why! graham@getvideostream.com

quality_preset_hint_incompatible_p1.message: Videostream converts videos so the Chromecast can play them!

quality_preset_hint_incompatible_p2.message: We've detected that your computer can't handle the conversion of this file.

quality_preset_hint_incompatible_p3.message: There ARE videos your computer can play! :) Try getting a lower quality mp4 format copy of this video instead!

quality_preset_hint_lower_quality.message: Videostream converts videos so the Chromecast can play them! Your computer may be a bit slow converting this video, try lowering the quality to fix buffering.

quality_preset_info.message: Videostream is automatically adjusting the quality of this video based on your computer's performance and current network conditions. This may take a minute or two!

recently_downloaded_dialog_p1.message: Recent Downloads will allow you to watch videos you have downloaded recently. To set up this feature, click HERE

recently_downloaded_dialog_p2.message: The history is not displayed past 5 videos, and you can delete them individually or stop history from being shown by turning off this feature HERE

remote_subs_download_failed.message: There was a problem downloading that subtitle :(

remote_subs_error.message: We couldn't load any subtitles from OpenSubtitles.org automatically :(

remote_subs_not_found.message: We couldn't find any subtitles on OpenSubtitles.org for this video :(

restart_chrome_how_to_p2.message: And paste that into your address bar! Then hit enter :)

resume_ask_disable.message: *Turn off this pop up permanently from G settings -> 'more'

resume_ask_subheader.message: Last time you left off at 0:0:00

select_chromecast_1.message: Can't find the Chromecast you want? Try this!

select_chromecast_2.message:
• Type chrome://restart into your url bar
  • Reboot your router and Chromecast (unplug/plug back in)

select_chromecast_3.message: If that doesn’t work, email us at team@getvideostream.com and we’ll help :)

select_chromecast_overlay_header.message: Please select your Chromecast to start watching

select_chromecast_overlay_header_no_rece.message: Do you have a Chromecast on your network?

select_chromecast_overlay_text.message: Select your Chromecast from the Google Cast extension ( ) in the top right of your Chrome browser.

select_chromecast_overlay_text_no_receiv.message: Make sure you're connected to the same WiFi as your Chromecast. If you still don't see it, sometimes restarting Chrome (type chrome://restart into your address bar) will fix the problem!

settings_about_content.message: Parts of Videostream use components from the FFMPEG and x264 projects and are available under conditions of the GPL

settings_analytics_opt_in_label.message: Help us by sending usage statistics?

settings_contact_content.message: Videostream is made by your 5 faithful developers - always feel free to contact us at team@getvideostream.com! Or tweet us @getvideostream!

settings_content_suggestions_opt_in_labe.message: Display 'Continue Watching' section? (clears and disables history when disabled)

settings_library_about.message: Select the folders where you store your videos. Videostream will allow you to browse and play these videos from your phone if you have the android app. We'll also auto-load subtitles from these folders and watch them for recent downloads!

settings_library_about_with_app.message: Select the folders where you store your videos. Videostream will allow you to browse and play these videos from your phone if you have the android app. We'll also auto-load subtitles from these folders and watch them for recent downloads!

settings_playlist_about.message: Add and remove your playlists here!

settings_resume_opt_in_label.message: Show pop up to resume videos where you left off?

settings_splash_content_images_opt_in_la.message:
Show content suggestions on TV?
(Note these are not paid ads! May need computer restart to take effect)

settings_subscription_content.message: If you are currently subscribed to Videostream on either a monthly or yearly basis, you can cancel by doing the following:

simplified_help_other_firewall_2.message: Have you run the port fixer? For every firewall your computer runs you may need to open TCP ports 5556 and 5558! Send us an email if you want help with that :)

simplified_help_other_firewall_3.message: See our antivirus and firewall guides here to see how to fix this in yours! - Note that many antiviruses run their own firewall (such as AVG, Avast, McAffee, Malwarebytes etc.).

simplified_help_other_loading_1.message: If the app is stuck on loading/buffering, one of these three steps usually helps:

simplified_help_other_loading_2.message:
• Type chrome://restart into your address bar
  • Reboot your router and Chromecast (unplug and plug back in)

simplified_help_other_loading_3.message: If this doesn’t help definitely email us! Don’t forget to attach the log file we generate :)

simplified_help_other_open_1.message: Get our shortcut extension to add a button right into chrome!

simplified_help_other_other_contact.message:
Super sorry if none of our other sections helped!

Check the community forums at or please email us so we can help! Just make sure to attach the log file we generate when you click “email” (team@getvideostream.com) below :)


Bonus Tip: did you know you can open Videostream by searching your Start Menu or Spotlight? You can add a shortcut on your desktop!

simplified_help_other_phone_2.message: If your phone cannot find Videostream it may be your firewall blocking the two from talking to eachother! Try our port fixer app to fix this.

simplified_help_other_phone_3.message: See our antivirus and firewall guides here to see how to fix this in yours! - Note that many antiviruses run their own firewall (such as AVG, Avast, McAffee, Malwarebytes etc.). Email us if you need help :)

simplified_help_other_stutter_1.message: Apologies! If you’re experiencing frequent pauses and do not usually try these steps:

simplified_help_other_stutter_2.message:
• Type chrome://restart into your address bar
  • Reboot your router and Chromecast (unplug and plug back in)

simplified_help_other_stutter_3.message: If this doesn’t help, or this is a frequent issue please email us! Attach the log file we generate :)

simplified_help_other_tabcast_2.message:
• Don't use the the chrome app launcher to open Videostream (see below)

  • Try using the app menu within Chrome instead!

simplified_help_other_tabcast_3.message: If that doesn’t fix the problem, please email us so we can help you out! Make sure you attach the log file we create :)

stuttering_cpu_dialog_p1.message: Sorry! We think your computer’s “cpu” can’t convert the video to the right format fast enough. Don’t worry though, you can change your quality options in the control bar!

stuttering_cpu_dialog_p2.message: Also, mp4 videos tend to play great all the time!

stuttering_network_dialog_p1.message: Sorry! We think your wifi router can’t keep up with this video. Don’t worry though, you can change your quality options to help in the control bar!

stuttering_network_dialog_p2.message: Also, mp4 videos tend to play great all the time!

subtitles_advanced_premium_only.message: Advanced subtitles are available with Videostream Premium :)

subtitles_styles_cant_override.message: We can't override the styles from your subtitles!

suggest_playlist_switch_notify_p1.message: Our suggestion playlist doesn't support full playlist controls.

suggest_playlist_switch_notify_p2.message: But! you can have as much fun as you want with your own playlist.

suggest_playlist_switch_notify_p3.message: Do you want to switch playlists?

summary_description_lifetime.message: You will be charged today and receive Videostream Premium forever!

summary_description_lifetime_promo.message: You will be charged today and receive Videostream Premium forever!

summary_description_monthly.message: You will be charged monthly starting today! You can cancel at anytime!

summary_description_yearly.message:
You will be charged today and receive Videostream Premium for a year!
You will then be charged a discounted monthly rate for every month after that.

summary_error_message.message: Uh oh, something went wrong! Click "Nevermind", check your credit card details and try again!

summary_tos.message: Smart people said we have to tell you to read our terms of service, so read them or you can't buy this thing.

superfast_description.message: If you think your router is worse than your computer, you should turn this on. It uses less network bandwith but requires a more powerful computer.

thank_you_page_paragraph_1.message: Awesome, intelligent, awe-inspiring, beautiful, magnificent, stunning, wonderful, breathtaking, impressive, majestic, mind-blowing, striking, amazing, astonishing, stupefying, rockin, sexy, fantastic, magically-delicious... and you probably smell pretty darn good, too.

thank_you_page_paragraph_2.message:
We couldn't keep doing this without people like you! Enjoy the music, bask in your own glory, and watch as we keep making Videostream better for you every day!

Did we mention we love you? Let's grow old together!

thank_you_page_subheader.message: You just went Premium! That makes you:

unable_to_load_file_dialog_p1.message: Videostream failed to load this file. Check to see if it exists.

unsupported_external_sub_message.message:
We can't display that subtitle format on a Chromecast :(
Right now you can use: srt, subrip, ass, ssa, sub, smi, sami and vtt

unsupported_internal_sub_message.message:
This video has a subtitle format we can't display on a Chromecast :(
Videostream supports these internal formats:
srt, subrip, ass, ssa and webvtt

want_to_survey_text.message: Would you like to complete a quick survey to help our team out?

wifi_failure_dialog_p1.message: This popup will close when you’re connected - Make sure it’s on!

wifi_failure_dialog_p2.message: If the popup never goes away <button class="kill-switch button-flat button-orange not-caps in-line" data-kill-switch="wifi">click here</button> to reload Videostream and try again.

windows_firewall_failure_dialog_p1.message:
Firewalls sometimes stop us from talking to your Chromecast, or your wifi network may be set to public!
Don’t worry though, we can help you to let us through. We promise to make it super easy!

windows_firewall_failure_dialog_p2.message: Try this utility. Download it, run it. It will open, and then almost immediately close when it's finished!

windows_firewall_failure_title.message: Uh Oh! It looks like your firewall is blocking Videostream :(

yearly_poke_text.message: a yearly subscription costs less than a trip to the movies ;)

yearly_poke_text_new.message: a yearly subscription costs less than a trip to the movies for two ;)
